introduction.summary: I am passionate about enhancing team efficiency and fostering conditions for success. With my experience in automation and dedication to learning, teaching, and listening, I aim to be a key contributor to a culture of innovation and continuous improvement.

experiences.title: Applications Cyber Security Engineer (Contractor, through Dogwood Management Partners LLC)
experiences.description: Directed the implementation of shift-left security strategies, significantly improving automation and proactive vulnerability management across critical projects.
highlights: Led a team of developers in implementing a comprehensive roadmap and coding standards, which significantly accelerated the adoption of modern best-practices and integration with cloud services.
Developed and integrated a Software Bill of Materials automation process using OWASP-CycloneDX, enhancing security compliance for all Python projects.
Transitioned technical documentation to a Docs as Code approach using Azure DevOps, streamlining updates and collaboration.
Formalized meeting expectations, including the use of agendas, eliminating ~50 hours in wasted meeting time for the security team each sprint.
Engineered a cloud-based solution to automate the transformation of vulnerability scan outputs into actionable Azure DevOps tickets, eliminating ~30 hours per sprint of manual management.
Enhanced Maven pipelines with OWASP Dependency-Check automation, bolstering security measures for Java projects.
Provided strategic guidance as a technical advisor on managed cloud services, guiding key decisions on system architectures and workload optimizations.

experiences.title: Senior Software Developer
experiences.description: Pioneered application development initiatives with a focus on SDLC automation and cloud-based infrastructure, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement among development teams.
highlights: Developed an efficiency-testing application, integrated a mail-server API, and enhanced search functionality within the Core project, boosting system performance and user satisfaction.
Supported and optimized web and desktop display libraries using MEDITECH's proprietary languages, enhancing application development efficiency and accessibility.
Architected and managed MEDITECH's Jenkins CI solution on Google Cloud Platform, significantly reducing Jenkins update risk and plugin management headaches.
Managed over 100 company-wide biweekly deployments, ensuring smooth, error-free releases and >99% uptime during business hours.
Engineered and documented numerous features and bug fixes for Jira-SVN integration, automating routine tasks and increasing team productivity.
Directed the migration from Python 2 to Python 3, overseeing a team that refactored and enhanced codebase integrity and test coverage.
Led developer education initiatives, providing mentoring, workshops, and documentation that improved coding practices and software quality across the company.
Functioned as scrum master while devising software delivery roadmaps that aligned with strategic goals and accelerated project timelines.
